Latest News

Kilifi County Football Championship Kicks Off with Exciting Opening Matches

The much-anticipated Kilifi County Football Championship began with a bang as teams from across the region showcased their skills in thrilling opening matches held at Mnarani Stadium yesterday. Spectators were treated to an electrifying atmosphere as local favorites Kilifi United FC secured a dominant 3-0 victory over Mtwapa Stars FC, displaying exceptional teamwork and strategic play. In another exciting fixture, Malindi City FC battled it out against Watamu Waves FC in a tightly contested match that ended in a 2-2 draw, leaving fans on the edge of their seats until the final whistle. The competition promises to be fierce as teams vie for supremacy and the coveted championship title.

Read More

Exciting Rugby Showdown: Kilifi Sharks Triumph in Intense Match Against Malindi Lions

Rugby enthusiasts were treated to an adrenaline-fueled showdown as the Kilifi Sharks clashed with the Malindi Lions in a gripping match at the Kilifi County Stadium. The atmosphere was charged with excitement as both teams delivered a display of skill, strength, and determination on the field. In a closely contested battle, the Kilifi Sharks emerged victorious with a narrow 21-17 win over their rivals, much to the delight of their passionate supporters. The match showcased the competitive spirit and camaraderie of rugby in Kilifi County, leaving fans eagerly anticipating the next thrilling encounter.
